games.title: Draw or Delete LoveStory
games.description: Dive into the engaging realm of Draw or Delete LoveStory, a fascinating puzzle game where you play a detective revealing a couple's secrets. Manipulate scenes by drawing or deleting elements on your phone or computer. Enjoy this thrilling adventure filled with surprises, all at no cost online.
games.howToPlayText: Look at the picture, read the task, draw or erase the element and complete the task! It's simple and very fun!

games.title: Love Archer Hero
games.description:
Welcome to Love Archer Hero game - one of the games about inspiring love feelings! In this interesting project, you play as a cheerful tricky Cupid, using your archer skills, bow and magic arrows of love to connect everyone and create loving couples!
Play have fun, solve puzzles and throw the arrow to a creature of your choice. After your arrow hits the target, they will fall in a beautiful garden and a magic of love will take them over.

Are you ready, my tiny Cupid hero? Shot your love arrows right into funny creatures' hearts to make them love each other and born a baby. Even the different types of creatures can make a solid couple and become happy parents. Combine orc and human for example and see how love conquers all!
games.howToPlayText:
Aim and Shoot: Use your finger (on mobile) or mouse (on desktop) to drag and release, aiming your arrow at your intended target. A dashed line indicates the trajectory of your shot.
Matchmaking: Your goal is to make two characters fall in love. This can involve hitting one or both individuals with your arrows.
Obstacles and Features: Levels may include barriers like glass, ropes, or wooden planks. Utilize these elements to guide your arrows to the targets.
Level Progression: Complete levels to unlock new ones. Each level presents unique challenges and characters.

games.title: 11 Kisses
games.description: Join the thrilling journey of "11 Kisses," where you aid Angel-Girl and Demon-Boy in their fight for love. Solve intriguing puzzles across diverse terrains to help them overcome obstacles. Accessible on both mobile and desktop, immerse yourself in this enchanting tale of passionate reunion.
games.howToPlayText: Build a logical path to reunite the loving couple. Strategically place objects to guide them back together!

games.title: Delete part in LoveStory
games.description:
In this dop 2 game, you'll witness a glimpse into the character's life and destiny.
Reflect on the missing elements and incorporate them in a single line!
When your brain out expectations are fulfilled, their dissatisfaction will fade, and a smile will grace your face!
Once again, their countenances will beam and they'll rejoice, as if they've received a windfall.
games.howToPlayText:
Analyze the Scene: Look at the image carefully and try to understand the situation. Each puzzle represents a small story or challenge.
Identify the Solution: Think about what’s missing or what needs to be uncovered to solve the problem.
Erase to Solve: Use your finger to erase a part of the image. The erased part will reveal the hidden solution or fix the problem in the scene.
Progress Through Levels: Complete each level to move on to the next challenge. The puzzles get more creative and tricky as you progress!
Enjoy the Fun: Each puzzle has a humorous or surprising twist, so don’t be afraid to experiment and try different approaches.
